user_query: Can you provide me with the latest stock prices for the indices NSE Nifty 500 and NSE Nifty Bank? I am specifically interested in the prices of stocks like ICICI Bank, HDFC Ltd, and Tata Consultancy Services.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest stock prices for the NSE Nifty 500 index.
Fetch the latest stock prices for the NSE Nifty Bank index.
Retrieve the latest stock prices for ICICI Bank.
Retrieve the latest stock prices for HDFC Ltd.
Retrieve the latest stock prices for Tata Consultancy Services.
